analysis.description:
Crowdsale.calculateExcessTokens (/unique_chucks/30/0x9192e2cb98de04234889d39e70b8f7fa3e591f8a.sol#772-793) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(weiNextTier) (/unique_chucks/30/0x9192e2cb98de04234889d39e70b8f7fa3e591f8a.sol#793)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.checkCompletedCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/30/0x9192e2cb98de04234889d39e70b8f7fa3e591f8a.sol#740-754):
	External calls:
	- vault.enableRefunds() (/unique_chucks/30/0x9192e2cb98de04234889d39e70b8f7fa3e591f8a.sol#744-746)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isEnded (/unique_chucks/30/0x9192e2cb98de04234889d39e70b8f7fa3e591f8a.sol#746-747)

TestPCoin.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/30/0x9192e2cb98de04234889d39e70b8f7fa3e591f8a.sol#330-331) shadows:
	- ERC20Basic.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/30/0x9192e2cb98de04234889d39e70b8f7fa3e591f8a.sol#128)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/30/0x9192e2cb98de04234889d39e70b8f7fa3e591f8a.sol#576-634):
	External calls:
	- token.distributeICOTokens(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/30/0x9192e2cb98de04234889d39e70b8f7fa3e591f8a.sol#618-619)
	External calls sending eth:
	- amountPaid = calculateExcessBalance() (/unique_chucks/30/0x9192e2cb98de04234889d39e70b8f7fa3e591f8a.sol#579-580)
	- tokens = calculateExcessTokens(amountPaid,limitTier1,1,rate) (/unique_chucks/30/0x9192e2cb98de04234889d39e70b8f7fa3e591f8a.sol#587)
	- tokens = calculateExcessTokens(amountPaid,limitTier2,2,rateTier2) (/unique_chucks/30/0x9192e2cb98de04234889d39e70b8f7fa3e591f8a.sol#596-597)
	- tokens = calculateExcessTokens(amountPaid,limitTier3,3,rateTier3) (/unique_chucks/30/0x9192e2cb98de04234889d39e70b8f7fa3e591f8a.sol#603-604)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- numberOfTransactions (/unique_chucks/30/0x9192e2cb98de04234889d39e70b8f7fa3e591f8a.sol#624-625)
	- tokensBought (/unique_chucks/30/0x9192e2cb98de04234889d39e70b8f7fa3e591f8a.sol#623)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/30/0x9192e2cb98de04234889d39e70b8f7fa3e591f8a.sol#576-634):
	External calls:
	- token.distributeICOTokens(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/30/0x9192e2cb98de04234889d39e70b8f7fa3e591f8a.sol#618-619)
	- vault.deposit.value(amountPaid)(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/30/0x9192e2cb98de04234889d39e70b8f7fa3e591f8a.sol#627-628)
	- vault.close() (/unique_chucks/30/0x9192e2cb98de04234889d39e70b8f7fa3e591f8a.sol#629)
	- checkCompletedCrowdsale() (/unique_chucks/30/0x9192e2cb98de04234889d39e70b8f7fa3e591f8a.sol#633-634)
	External calls sending eth:
	- amountPaid = calculateExcessBalance() (/unique_chucks/30/0x9192e2cb98de04234889d39e70b8f7fa3e591f8a.sol#579-580)
	- tokens = calculateExcessTokens(amountPaid,limitTier1,1,rate) (/unique_chucks/30/0x9192e2cb98de04234889d39e70b8f7fa3e591f8a.sol#587)
	- tokens = calculateExcessTokens(amountPaid,limitTier2,2,rateTier2) (/unique_chucks/30/0x9192e2cb98de04234889d39e70b8f7fa3e591f8a.sol#596-597)
	- tokens = calculateExcessTokens(amountPaid,limitTier3,3,rateTier3) (/unique_chucks/30/0x9192e2cb98de04234889d39e70b8f7fa3e591f8a.sol#603-604)
	- walletB.transfer(amountPaid) (/unique_chucks/30/0x9192e2cb98de04234889d39e70b8f7fa3e591f8a.sol#626-627)
	- vault.deposit.value(amountPaid)(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/30/0x9192e2cb98de04234889d39e70b8f7fa3e591f8a.sol#627-628)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isRefunding (/unique_chucks/30/0x9192e2cb98de04234889d39e70b8f7fa3e591f8a.sol#633-634)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.checkCompletedCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/30/0x9192e2cb98de04234889d39e70b8f7fa3e591f8a.sol#740-754):
	External calls:
	- vault.enableRefunds() (/unique_chucks/30/0x9192e2cb98de04234889d39e70b8f7fa3e591f8a.sol#744-746)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isRefunding (/unique_chucks/30/0x9192e2cb98de04234889d39e70b8f7fa3e591f8a.sol#746)
